sense.def:
To commit a crime or a sin
pomeni storiti zločin ali greh.

seg.quote: He has committed a criminal offence.
Margaret had no intention of committing suicide.

sense.def:
To commit money or resources to something
pomeni uporabiti denar ali sredstva v neki poseben namen.

seg.quote: Rolls Royce must commit its entire resources to the project.

sense.def:
To commit oneself to a course of action
pomeni dokončno skleniti, da bomo storili določeno opravilo ali delo.

seg.quote: I really wouldn't like to commit myself.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
committed to a hospital or prison
, ga napotijo v bolnišnico ali pošljejo v zapor.

seg.quote: She was committed to a mental hospital.

sense.def:
To commit something to memory
pomeni nekaj si zapomniti.
